director.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who controls or manages a company

a former director of Gartmore Pensions Ltd
director.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone who is in charge of a particular activity or organization
director.translation[0].definitions[1].n: finance/marketing/sales etc director (=the person in charge of the financial department etc)

director.translation[1].definitions[0].d: one of the committee of top managers who control a company
director.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The board of directors are expected to cut the 35-cent quarterly dividend when they meet later this month.
